casebody.data:
RIPELLINO
v.
BOARD OF EDUCATION. No. 180A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 11, 2006. Stephanie H. Autry, Rachel B. Esposito, Meredith T. Black, Raleigh, James R. Lawrence, Jr., for Johnston County Bd. of Ed. Bradley N. Schulz, Smithfield, for Michael Ripellino, et al. Barbara B. Weyher, T. Carlton Younger, III, for School Boards, et al. K. Dean Shatley, Asheville, for NC Council School of Attys.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of August 2006 by NC Council of School Attorneys for Extension of Time to Move for Leave to File Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. By order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of August 2006."
